trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controla como um documento é impresso em um aplicativo do Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: This class implements a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and adds a status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe implementa uma <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> e adiciona uma caixa de diálogo de status.

trans-unit.source: A print controller specifies how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um controlador da impressora como um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> é impresso.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> de classe, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir com formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing> namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and assign it to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> e atribuí-la para o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have added the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace to the class and that you have created a new instance of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> as `myDocumentPrinter`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que você adicionou o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace para a classe e que você criou uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> como `myDocumentPrinter`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> a encapsular.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class, wrapping the supplied <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> encapsulando o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> a encapsular.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing a title for the status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém um título para a caixa de diálogo de status.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class, wrapping the supplied <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> and specifying a title for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" />, encapsulando o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> fornecido e especificando um título para a caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor indicando que este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> é usado para a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> is used for print preview, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> é usado para a visualização de impressão, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.IsPreview%2A> checks the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> property of the underlying controller.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.IsPreview%2A> verifica o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> propriedade do controlador subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como uma página de um documento será impressa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sobre o encapsulada <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> método é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção é gerada dentro de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> não for chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> método cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> para definir como imprimir uma página em um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode ajustar as configurações de página separadamente para cada página.) <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como um documento será impresso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sobre o encapsulada <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> método é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> método cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> para determinar quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode programar a impressão para 30 minutos ou ajustar as configurações de impressora para o documento.) O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir uma página de um documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa uma página de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sobre o encapsulada <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> método é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> método cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> para definir como imprimir uma página em um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode ajustar as configurações de página separadamente para cada página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como um documento será impresso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sobre o encapsulada <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> método é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> para determinar quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode programar a impressão para 30 minutos ou ajustar as configurações de impressora para o documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> é um bom lugar para verificar se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> são válidos.
